issue.title: Qt5: GUI overlay plugins not working?

content.raw: after uncommenting out the [Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/8d35d7d913a368dc6d39105fa42c4ff05a4e858e/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#GLWidget.cc-81) attribute, the gui overlays started showing again. It was causing some gui test failures during early stage of Qt5 integration but maybe the tests can be fixed. We should try bring back the flag.
content.html: after uncommenting out the Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen attribute, the gui overlays started showing again. It was causing some gui test failures during early stage of Qt5 integration but maybe the tests can be fixed. We should try bring back the flag.
